name: Sunshine RPG
description:
"Sunshine RPG" is a game of mystery and piscological terror that will delight all lovers of RPGs.

In this game you will be incarnated in "Sunny", a student who lives and studies in a boarding school. Sunny hates to live there, in that boarding school, and she does not have many friends there, she is quite alone and it seems a very boring place.

One morning Sunny wakes up one morning and finds the boarding school practically empty, and the people left there are not allowed to leave, and act strangely.

In a moment he decides to go downstairs because of the strange sounds that everyone hears and that are frightening the cooks.
There he will meet Mint, a boy who is at that moment looking for his sister.

Together they begin to discover the secrets and the magic that are behind the mysterious events that start to happen
